page.title: 05EMPLOYMENT
page.content: The majority of people in this area are employed in London, Bromley or the neighbouring area. There is limited employment in this area. Patulio Higgs (Agricultural Merchants) employ 40, Keston College employs 27. The farms in the area mostly have 1 employee. The Riding Schools and Livery Yards are mainly family concerns with D.I.Y. Liveries. Reuthes nursery employsa few people as does Keston Fruit Farm with additional seasonal staf. At Graylins Farm there is a panel beating shop. The dentists has a receptionist and women are employed as domestic cleaners in the larger houses.
